title: Ruling on boiling water in drainage
transcript: ruling on uh uh throwing boiled water in the drainage so people uh boil rice and then they put the access water in the uh sewer or the drains uh or the sink or whatever because Jin lives there this is uh not something authentic we don't have authentic uh hadiths referring to this but it is always best to say bismah and Bismillah protects you and protects the Gin if there to be any gin so whenever you do this just say bah and throw it and you have no problem with that
